entry.title: neuherbs Healthy Seeds Mix

Type: Seeds
Price: 199.00

neuherbs brings to you a Healthy Seeds Mix with wholesome nutrition that consists of 5 different kinds of seeds: Pumpkin, Sunflower, Watermelon, Flax and Chia seeds each with their own health benefits. These seeds can help you achieve overall health goals when consumed regularly.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Good For Heart & Brain

    This seeds mix is rich in Omega-3, which is shown to manage cholesterol levels & improves memory

  • Good For Immunity & Bones

    Pumpkin & Watermelon Seeds are known to be full of essential minerals that help keep you energetic & boost immunity as well

  • Good For Hair & Skin

    Sunflower Seeds are rich in Vitamin E & healthy fats which makes it helpful for improving hair & skin health

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw

    To deliver you the natures best

  • Unroasted

    To deliver the natural taste with intact nutrients

  • Plant-Based

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • In Breakfast

    By toping on your favorite Smoothies, Oatmeal and Shakes

  • As Mid- Day Munching

    By toping on your favorite Smoothies, Oatmeal and Shakes

  • As Anytime Snack

    Mix with cakes or muffin batter or sprinkle on top. It also goes great with granola bar

  • Is this Seeds mix roasted?

    No, this Healthy Seeds Mix is completey raw & unroasted.

  • What is the shelf-life?

    The shelf-life of neuherbs Healthy Seeds Mix is 12 months from the date of packaging.

  • Can I use it while travelling?

    Yes, it comes in a food grade zip lock pouch which you can carry with you anywhere.

  • Are these seeds gluten-free?

    Yes, these seeds are naturally gluten free & healthy for your gut also.

  • Are they peeled?

    Yes, neuherbs Healthy seeds Mix contains raw, unroasted, and deshelled seeds to help you reap the health benefits of without any extra effort.

  • Do we need to wash it or are they ready-to-use seeds?

    Neuhebrs Healthy Seeds Mix is ready-to-use. No need to wash them.

  • Are they GMO or NON-GMO?

    These Seeds are cultivated organically through natural pollination. Thus, they are naturally GMO-free.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Seeds
Price: 185.00 - 675.00 (2 variants)

neuherbs Organic Chia Seeds are raw, unroasted, and are packed with protein, fiber, calcium & other minerals. These super seeds are easy to incorporate in Indian diet to gain maximum health benefits.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Chia Seeds For Weight Management

    Chia seeds are naturaly rich in fiber & protein that bulk up your favorite foods when added & assits in weight management by improving satiety

  • Chia Seeds For Skin

    Chia seeds are found to be rich in antioxidants that help fight free-radicals damage, and inflammation. Also, they help soothe skin due to their cooling properties.

  • Chia Seeds For Blood Sugar Management

    Due to the richness in dietary fiber, chia seeds are known to help manage instant blood sugar spikes after a high carb meal

— Key Ingredients —

  • Raw

    To deliver you natural healthy food.

  • Unroasted

    To deliver the naturally intact nutrients.

  • Organic

    To deliver you a quality product.

— How To Use —

  • For Morning Detoxification Drink

    Use it in your regular morning lemon water for body detoxification.

  • For Your sweet Tooth

    Add it into your homemade biscuits, cookies, & sweetbreads.

  • For Guilt Free Snacking

    Use it as a crunchy topping for your oatmeal, granola, poha, or icecreams.

  • Are these seeds salted ?

    neuherbs Chia Seeds are raw, unroasted, organic & unsalted for better health benefits.

  • Can I Roast Them?

    Yes, you can roast them. For more benefits, add it raw to your water or buttermilk and cosnume it.

  • Are these sabja seeds?

    Sabja seeds and Chia seeds both are different seeds. Sabja seeds are small black colored round shaped, while chia seeds are a bit larger, oval-shaped, and come in black, white, or sometimes grey color and are loaded with essential nutrients.

  • Can I consume it raw?

    No, as per the recommendation chia seeds should be soaked in water or roasted prior to use for consumption.

  • Can it be used by a teenager for weight loss?

    Chia Seeds are naturally rich in fiber and other weight healthy nutrients. neuherbs organic chia seed which are raw, unroasted, is a perfect weight loss drink. It is recommended for people above the age of 18 years. We suggest you to consult with your physician or dietitian before adding to your diet.

  • Can it be used for cultivation?

    Yes! neuherbs Chia Seeds are natural, raw, unroasted chia seeds that have been used by people for gardening and sprouting. So, you can also give it a try.
